Number, Formguestcode, formguestname, FromName, Fromcity, Fromcityname, Fromprovince, FromProvincename, fromarea, fromareaname, Fromareastreet, Fromareastreetname, Fromincname, Fromaddress, Fromtel, Fromcode, Toguestname, Toguestcode, Toprovince, Toprovincename, Tocity, Tocityname, ToArea, ToAreaname, Toareastreet, Toareastreetname, Toincname, Toaddress, Toname, Tocode, Totel, Paymentflag, Paymentforgoods, Isfile, isgoods, Filename, Num, Weight, Longs, Widths, Heights, Volume, begintime, Senduserid, Sendusername, fromusersignature, sendusersignature, Iscollection, Paymode, Isinsured, Insuredsumprice, Insuredprice, Ismobilesend, Mobileprice, Price, Sendmode, Modeprice, Tousersignature, Collectionsignature, Signaturecode, Endtime, Sumprice, Deliveryuserid, Deliveryusername, Createuserid, Createusername, Createincnumber, Createincname, zqj, zjj, sfdshk, dshk, dsfy, qfhd, hdh, fdfy, tsps, ywfy, yyfy, bzjg, clfy, rgfy, qtgxhfw, dzfy, iszf, isduanxin, sjrshouji, wupinnum, wupinprices, kahao, dsfwf, tssp, isqdfh, zzfwqt, fyjs, fyzl, fyjfzl, yyfjf, fkfs, fkfsqt, yuejiezhanghu, openid, sfz, zhCode, zhNumber, isGetTrace
mapper.select: SELECT * from eforces_order where Number=#{Number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * from eforces_order where id=#{id}

select * from eforces_distributedscan distribute join eforces_order bill on distribute.billsnumber = bill.Number join eforces_customersign sign on sign.Number = distribute.billsnumber where bill.Paymentflag = 1 and distribute.postmanid = #{postmanid}

select * from eforces_distributedscan distribute join eforces_order bill on distribute.billsnumber = bill.Number where bill.Paymentflag = 1 and distribute.postmanid = #{postmanid} and bill.Number not in (select sign.Number from eforces_customersign sign where sign.OperatorId = #{postmanid})
SELECT bill.* from eforces_order bill JOIN eforces_receivedscan receive ON receive.billsnumber=bill.number WHERE incid=#{incid}
select * from eforces_order where isDelete=0 AND openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update eforces_order set isDelete=1 where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select * from eforces_order where Createuserid=#{Createuserid} order by Createtime desc
select DISTINCT bill.* from eforces_order bill join eforces_customersign sign on bill.Number = sign.Number where sign.DeliveryUserId = #{Createuserid} order by bill.Createtime desc
SELECT * FROM eforces_order WHERE Number LIKE "%"#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"

SELECT * FROM eforces_order WHERE isDelete = 0 and Number in
#{id}
SELECT bill.* from eforces_order bill join eforces_sentscan sent on bill.Number = sent.billsnumber where bill.isDelete = 0 and sent.incid = #{incid}

SELECT receive.incid, bill.* from eforces_order bill JOIN eforces_receivedscan receive on bill.number = receive.billsnumber where bill.isDelete = 0 and receive.incid = #{incid} and receive.billsnumber not in ( SELECT number from eforces_customersign )
select count(*) from eforces_order where Createuserid = #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
